message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1400000. This is a great opportunity to get a fantastic deal, and I'm looking forward to hearing your thoughts.
